title: Colombia Core Consumer Prices
description: Core Consumer Prices in Colombia increased to 120.48 points in September from 119.38 points in August of 2022. Core Consumer Prices in Colombia averaged 73.38 points from 1998 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 120.48 points in September of 2022 and a record low of 36.13 points in January of 1999. This page provides - Colombia Core Consumer Prices - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Banco de la Republica de Colombia
